Title: Swallow
Writer: Farhad Safinia (creator), Lynnie Greene, Richard Levine, Angelina Burnett (story)
Actors: Kelsey Grammer, Connie Nielsen, Hannah Ware, Jeff Hephner
Plot: As Zajac's campaign gains momentum, Kane has problems adjusting to his new medical reality. An embarrassing media storm catches Governor Cullen off guard while Miller stumbles upon a story that seeps much deeper than he imagined.
